author: Special Correspondent
text:
Chief Minister Jayalalithaa, through video conferencing from Chennai, declared open new facilities including a trauma care centre at the Thanjavur Medical College Hospital here on Monday.

The buildings and facilities have been created at a cost of Rs. 1 crore. Other new facilities declared open include 23-bed facility each for men and women patients. The Chief Minister also declared open Amma Amudham groceries outlet near the Punnainallur Mariamman temple bye pass under the aegis of the Tamil Nadu Civil Supplies Corporation. The self-service facility has groceries, cosmetics and other sections.
title: CM inaugurates new facilities
